Name: PixelPurr
Description: Born in the neon-lit backstreets of the digital metropolis, PixelPurr is a cyber feline with a knack for mischief and coding. With its classic button interface and a screen displaying an enigmatic grin, PixelPurr is a beloved figure in the WebtrES club, known for its playful pranks and quick wit. Although its arms are often at rest, hand down, its mind is always racing, conjuring up the next byte of fun. Despite its mischievous nature, PixelPurr has a heart of gold, offering a helping paw to fellow members in need of tech support or a good laugh.
